agency.name: Shubham IoT Homes
agency.about: We specialize in creating smart, connected environments through IoT-driven automation. From homes to offices, we design intelligent solutions that make life easier, safer, and more efficient.

contact.address: A-108/6B, A Block, Sector 58, Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India

services.title: Smart Home Automation
services.description: Control lighting, appliances, and security with a single touch or voice command.

services.title: Office Automation
services.description: Enhance productivity with automated lighting, air conditioning, and energy monitoring systems.

services.title: IoT Device Integration
services.description: Seamless integration of sensors, cameras, and controllers into a unified system.

services.title: Energy Monitoring
services.description: Track and reduce energy consumption with intelligent IoT monitoring solutions.

services.title: Custom IoT Solutions
services.description: Tailored IoT applications to meet specific business or residential needs.

services.title: Maintenance & Support
services.description: Ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your IoT systems run smoothly.

projects.name: Smart Villa Project
projects.description: Installed IoT lighting, climate control, and smart locks for a luxury villa.

projects.name: Corporate Office IoT
projects.description: Automated HVAC, lighting, and security for a 10,000 sq. ft. office.

projects.name: Energy Monitoring System
projects.description: Developed real-time energy tracking dashboard for industrial plant.

testimonials.name: Rahul Mehta
testimonials.feedback: The automation system transformed our villa project. Clients are thrilled with the smart features.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.feedback: Their IoT solutions helped us cut energy costs by 30%. Excellent service and support!
